name: Keno Pad
description:
This retro style Keno game looks beautiful on the magical new iPad. Tap between 2 and 10 numbers that you think will come up. Then anxiously watch as 20 random numbers, or balls, are chosen to see how many matches you get. The more you bet, the more you win (or lose…)!

Keno Pad provides hours of fun. If you like other casino games like poker, texas hold 'em, slot machines, roulette, or black jack, then you'll want to add this exciting Classic Keno game to your collection!

We give you 100 Credits to start. Can you get up to 1,000? Ten thousand? One Million? We challenge you to do so. Send us a screen shot if you get up to one million.

Features:
• Retro Casino Feel
• Win Meter
• Quick Pick
• Play in Landscape or Portrait
• 5 Speeds (Slow, Normal, Fast, Really Fast, and Instant)
• Saves Credits
• 2-click betting
